replies.body: where is the name and shame area btw, so many feeders with negative attitudes, you mute them they feed more, you report them they continue to feed and ruin other peoples games, the account "CliveBot" goes Jax top and goes 0/32/4 and i get reported for assisting the enemy team when i actually helped as 3/9/35 Thresh, yeh i reported Jax for intentionally feeding so did my ADC Miss Fortune who went 40/12/11 seriously the priorities and mentality of people on this game  is really sad and depressing, specially when you actually try to win for the team and you get called a try hard, seriously Riot give me control of the Tribunal i wont let you down i dont care if i dont play any more, id rather make the game a better more interesting place then 1 sided bullshit every game, OH YEH wtf is with the queues lately too, last few games ive looked at the other team to see that they have OVER 1000 wins more then our team whats with that, im getting queued against people with 300-400-900 wins even when i have 80 odd, but anyways that CliveBot needs a perma ban, and fix the queues or tell me why the fuck im versing golds and diamonds in normals when i just hit lv 30

Actually if you read a post about a week or so ago, there was big talk about change coming for these things. Intentional feeding being one of these with new systems being tried with much success to counter such problems.

sweet yeh i didn't read it :( cheers for the heads up thou :) just need to control myself and stop adding fuel to the already massive shit storm, its just annoying you go so well, like 3/9/35 as support, your adc gets 41 kills and u have a spoilt little kid not getting his way so he continuously feeds, then you get reported for no real reason, because i was helping the other team out? how does that even work, i wasn't the one feeding i was trying to hold the team up ugh, just frustrating that's all
what happens if I own like maybe 2 of the 5 champs? do I get like a slight Discount??????{{champion:80}}
Yes, you get a slightly discounted price of the price in the brackets. Just like if you already own and skin or two the price would reduce a little too.

The price of the bundle is for when you own the champions in it, if you don't own the champions you will be buying the champions in the bundle you don't own as well as the skins.{{item:3301}} {{item:3301}} {{item:3301}}
